name: MERIMBULA AIR SERVICES PTY LTD
about: Merimbula Air Services Pty Ltd, located at Merimbula Airport on the beautiful Sapphire Coast of NSW, offers comprehensive flight training programs. Our experienced and fully qualified instructors provide personalized training, helping students achieve their aviation goals. We offer Recreational Pilot Licence (RPL), Private Pilot Licence (PPL), and Commercial Pilot Licence (CPL) programs, with a focus on practical, competency-based training. Our fleet includes Cessna 172s and other higher-performance aircraft. We also provide online theory resources and in-house testing facilities. With pilot accommodation available near the airport, we ensure a supportive and convenient learning environment. Contact us to tailor a training plan that suits your specific needs and aspirations in aviation.
services:
["Recreational Pilot License
RPL (endorsements)
Private Pilot License
Commercial Pilot License"]
